resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
zeroshade opened a new pull request #11389:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11389


   Also updates the type ID enums accordingly, adding type ids for as of yet unsupported types to reduce the size of future changes.
   
   Broken out from #11310 to shrink the size of the change to implement MonthDayNano intervals in Go


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Adding Type IDs for the "Large" types so that subsequent changes to implement them can be slightly smaller and not having to add the type id everywhere.
